Package org.jogger.test

The testing infrastructure for Jogger applications.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
JoggerTest This is an utility class that you can extend for testing Jogger applications.
MockRequest This is a Request implementation that stores the request state in attributes.
MockResponse This is a Response implementation that stores the response state in attributes.
 

Package org.jogger.test Description

The testing infrastructure for Jogger applications.
